db:abstract.db:para: The address book example shows how to use proxy models to display different views onto data from a single model.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += widgets
SOURCES = adddialog.cpp \ addresswidget.cpp \ main.cpp \ mainwindow.cpp \ newaddresstab.cpp \ tablemodel.cpp HEADERS = adddialog.h \ addresswidget.h \ mainwindow.h \ newaddresstab.h \ tablemodel.h
# install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/widgets/itemviews/addressbook INSTALLS += target
